import axios from "axios" import "./singlepost.css" import { useLocation } from "react-router" import { useEffect } from "react" export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation() const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2] useEffect(()=>{ const getPost = async ()=>{ const res = await axios.get("/posts/" + path) console.log(res) } getPost() },[path]) return (
